get.depictor

Source: R/visual.R
get.depictor.Rd

return an RcdkDepictor.

Usage

get.depictor(
  width = 200,
  height = 200,
  zoom = 1.3,
  style = "cow",
  annotate = "off",
  abbr = "on",
  suppressh = TRUE,
  showTitle = FALSE,
  smaLimit = 100,
  sma = NULL,
  fillToFit = FALSE
)

Arguments

width

Default. 200

height

Default. 200

zoom

Default. 1.3

style

Default. cow

annotate

Default. off

abbr

Default. on

suppressh

Default. TRUE

showTitle

Default. FALSE

smaLimit

Default. 100

sma

Default. NULL

fillToFit

Defailt. FALSE
